name: .VPH File Extension
summary: Learn about .VPH files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Preference file that stores user settings for the virtualPhotographer Photoshop plug-in; can be loaded within the plug-in to recall previously saved settings.

content: VirtualPhotographer may be used for adding various effects and color correction to pictures and photos.
